title: Looking into Infinity
description: This collection consists of one hundred poems and ten short stories, which give a glance into the infinite possibilities of human emotion. C. Dougherty writes with her heart on her sleeve, and does not shy from touching upon a variety of both light and dark content. Anxiety, passion, healing, anger, sarcasm, and inner strength are just a few topics from this collection.
author: Cynthia Dougherty-Bernal
